name: Escape Death (T0M1)
description:
Escape Death

Shark Studio joined a game jam with the theme "stuck in a loop".

This game was made in 3 weeks.

WARNING! - This game contains graphic content that some viewers/players may find disturbing. Viewer discretion is advised.

Escape Death is a challenging top-down single player game in which you are stuck in a loop of ongoing suicidal thoughts. Escape these nightmares by committing to these thoughts and ending it all before you awake. Beware, if not all nightmares have been committed till sunrise you will end up dead after waking because of depression.   

Special Thanks To Our Team:

Artists:

  • Sebastian Schistek
  • David Hrebik

  • Wolfgang Brunner

Try to find every item, every death, and every ending?
